Mean = (1550+1700+900+850+1000+950)/6 = 6950/6 =1158.3333

variance(sigma)**2 / (n-1)

= [(1550-1158.3333)**2 + (1700-1158.3333)**2 + (900-1158.3333)**2 + (850-1158.3333)**2 + (1000-1158.3333)**2 + (950-1158.3333)**2]/5
= [ 153402.8038 +293402.8138 + 66736.0938 + 95069.4238 + 25069.4338 + 43402.7638 ]/5

=677083.3328/5 = 135416.6665

SD = Squareroot(135416.6665) = $367.9900
